reg:regulation.reg:title:
Transportation and Infrastructure
Collections Commission Regulation
reg:regulation.reg:amsincluded: [includes amendments up to B.C. Reg. 4/2010, January 14, 2010]

bcl:section.bcl:text: A person who is retained under contract with the ministry of the minister responsible for the administration of the Transportation Act to collect overdue fines accounts receivable

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: may be authorized to retain a fee or commission from the amounts actually collected, or
may be paid out of consolidated revenue fund a fee or commission

bcl:section.bcl:text: calculated under section 2 and provided for under the contract.
The amount of a commission or fee or authorized to be retained is calculated as follows:

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: on a first referral of the amount for collection under contract, up to 22.5% of the amount actually collected;
on a second or subsequent referral of the amount for collection under contract, up to 50% of the amount actually collected;
for searching for information and the location of the debtor or the debtor assets, up to $50.

reg:content.reg:provisionsnote: [Provisions of the Financial Administration Act, R.S.B.C. 1996, c. 138, relevant to the enactment of this regulation: section 14 (2)]
